meanings.definition: A large theater or concert hall.
meanings.sent1: The odeums in our city host many exciting performances.
meanings.sent2: We visited the odeums to watch a play last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The odeums were so big that even giants could comfortably watch a show there.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the odeums like a powerful wave.
meanings.sent5: The grand chandelier in the odeums sparkled like a thousand stars.

meanings.definition: A building or venue used for musical or theatrical performances.
meanings.sent1: The odeums in town always have lively events.
meanings.sent2: The new odeums in the city are state-of-the-art.
meanings.sent3: The odeums were so busy that even the mice wanted tickets to the show.
meanings.sent4: The odeums stood tall, a beacon of culture in the city.
meanings.sent5: The odeums buzzed with excitement as the audience waited for the performance to begin.
